title: Episode 11, Guest Daniel Hill on Plantinga's Reformed Epistemology (Part II)
itunes:title: Episode 11, Guest Daniel Hill on Plantinga's Reformed Epistemology (Part II)
description: You can find links to all the reading at www.thepanpsychist.com/panpsycast. Make sure you’ve subscribed to us on iTunes to get new episodes as and when they’re released! Thank you, we hope you enjoy the episode! Part I. Plantinga’s Reformed Epistemology (Episode 11, Part I). Part II. Analysis and discussion (Episode 11, Part II).

Thank you, we hope you enjoy the episode! Part I. Plantinga’s Reformed Epistemology (Episode 11, Part I). Part II. Analysis and discussion (Episode 11, Part II).
itunes:subtitle: Welcome to Episode 11 (Part II of II) on Alvin Plantinga's reformed epistemology. In this instalment we analyse and criticise Plantinga’s argument. Tweet us your thoughts www.twitter.com/thepanpsycast.
itunes:author: The Panpsycast and Daniel Hill (University of Liverpool)
